channel.title: Quasars Behind the Galactic Plane on Yuming Fu's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Quasars Behind the Galactic Plane on Yuming Fu's Homepage

item.title: Finding Quasars behind the Galactic Plane
item.description: Quasars behind the Galactic Plane (GPQs) are important astrometric references and useful probes of Milky Way gas, yet difficult to find.

item.title: Featured Science: PKU Astronomers Discover Nearly 200 New Quasars behind the Galactic Plane
item.description: We are located at the edge of the Galactic disk, and see our Galaxy as a hazy band of light made of countless stars in the night sky.
